scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && echo "> [build] Done!"
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && mv dist/*.* . && echo "> [cjs] Done!"
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run mv && echo "> [esm] Done!"
scripts.mv: echo "> [WARN] The 'mv' command might not work well on Windows!"; for f in dist/*.js; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}".mjs; done; mv dist/*.mjs .
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
